CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 4, 1957, pg. 2 reads: "Posthumous Honor - Mrs. Elizabeth C. Smith (center), widow of the late James B. Smith, is shown accepting a posthumous citation for her husband's devotion to duty from Postmaster General Arthur E. Summerfield. Presenting the citation is Carl M. Young (left) of District 11, Cincinnati Region POD, who represented V.V. DeJean, district postal transportation manager.  Witnessing the presentation is Frederick D. Lee (right), president, Pittsburgh Branch National Alliance of Postal Employees, of which Mr. Smith was a charter member. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Carl M. Young, presenting Elizabeth C. Smith with a posthumous citation for her husband from the Postmaster General, with Frederick D. Lee looking on, standing in interior with floral curtains
